name: BABY TETHER
description: BabyTether is a new token in the Binance Smart Chain network, which allows each holder to receive permanent passive earnings, paid in $USDT. What could be more stable than receiving rewards immediately in USDT? Nothing! Simply hold $BabyTether tokens and get rewarded in USDT on every transaction! BabyTether was launched on January 22, 2022 at 7:00 PM UTC. Total Supply of 100 billion were released, 12% of which were burned at launch! Team tokens are 5% and locked for 9 months with a linear unlock. The remaining tokens are locked for at least a year. Our team really likes the idea of projects that pay rewards to holders immediately in the form of stablecoins (USDT, BUSD). But in reality, there are very few such high-quality projects on the market. That is why we are here! And our mission is to distribute BabyTether not in a narrowly focused way only in the cryptocurrency community, but by embracing a large number of ordinary people who are just starting to study the cryptocurrency world.
